task.title: How to Integrate Google Analytics in WebHelp
task.shortdesc: See how you can integrate Google Analytics into WebHelp output.

context.p: To enable WebHelp to benefit of Google Analytics reports, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Create a new Google Analytics account if you do not have one and log on.
Choose the Analytics solution that fits your website.
Follow the onscreen instructions in order to obtain a Tracking Code containing your Tracking ID.
Save the Tracking Code obtained in the previous step into a new HTML file called googleAnalytics.html.
Duplicate an existing WebHelp transformation scenario (depending on your needs, it may be with or without feedback, or the mobile variant).
Switch to the Parameters tab and edit the webhelp.footer.file parameter to reference the googleAnalytics.html created earlier.
